#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	int i,n,q,ind,m,*a;char s[10];
	     scanf("%d",&n);a=new int[n];
	     scanf("%d",&q);
	     while(q--)
	{
	     	scanf("%s",s);
		if(strcmp(s,"ASK")==0)
		{
			scanf("%d",&ind);printf("%d\n",a[ind]);
	    }
		else
		{
			scanf("%d %d",&ind,&m);
		for(i=1;i*ind<=n;++i) a[i*ind]+=m;
		}
		 
    }
		    return 0;
}
